products.mbn_desc: The website for MBN 電子取引 presents a cloud-based platform designed to streamline business-to‐business transaction workflows: from invoice creation and delivery, through receipt, to electronic bookkeeping and archival.
products.mbn_feature_1: Supports sending, receiving and storing invoices, estimates, purchase orders, delivery notes and receipts in one unified platform.
products.mbn_feature_2: Enables upload and transmission of existing invoice PDFs
products.mbn_feature_3: Email notifications to confirm when the recipient has received the invoice — visibility across send/receive.
products.skysales_desc: SKYSALES is a flexible, cloud-based business platform that empowers organisations - from solo entrepreneurs to large enterprises - to build and run their own branded digital ecosystem. You can launch your own "My Platform" space, host live-commerce, webinars, events, e-commerce.
products.skysales_feature_1: Support for live video selling (LIVE commerce) plus standard e-commerce store front functionalities.
products.skysales_feature_2: Engage users/customers through posts, timeline updates.
products.skysales_feature_3: Schedule, invite and join online meetings seamlessly via built-in calendar and meeting tools.
